DOC.brief_summary: Cataract surgery among world 's frequently perform operation . It involve removal opaque lens human eye implantation artificial lens . The operation perform local anaesthesia use ultrasound technology , lens emulsify removed suction . Femtosecond laser-assisted cataract surgery new innovative surgical procedure improve quality cataract surgery provide new best possible standard quality . In contrast conventional method capsulotomy fragemntation fully automatically perform femtosecond laser . In addition , lens fragment laser , substantially facilitate removal reduces operation time . Study investigate whether femtosecond laser cataract surgery cause significant difference clinical outcome compare conventional , manual continuous curvilinear capsulorhexis ( CCC ) . Effective phako time ( EPT ) define duration phakoemulsifikation crystalline lens . EPT conventional surgery intraoperative visit > EPT oflaser-assisted surgery intraoperative visit
DOC.criteria: Age 18 year related cataract Ability follow instruction treatment team Both eye receive surgery Narrow pupil ( ther . mydriasis < 6mm ) Narrow orbit Sunken eye manifest glaucoma treat antiglaucomatous therapy prior surgery Conditions pose high risk complication surgery Known sensitivity plan concomitant medication Patients disorder ocular muscle , nystagmus strabismus Patients blind one eye Acute chronic systemic and/or ocular illness clinically significant increase risk subject confound outcome study , restrict diabetes mellitus , autoimmune/rheumatic connective tissue disease , dementia epilepsy . Patients pregnant nursing Patients give inform consent
